guiTeacher.components

Class RadioButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiTeacher.components.Component
      • guiTeacher.components.StyledComponent
        • guiTeacher.components.TextLabel
          • guiTeacher.components.Button
            • guiTeacher.components.RadioButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clickable, TextComponent, Visible

    public class RadioButton
extends Button
    An individual Radio Button. When assigned to peers, only one RadioButton can be selected at a time. Call addPeer to pair with other Buttons. See also the RadioButtons class, which elegantly handles large number of RadioButton
    Author:
    bnockles
